scripts.dev:bg: (lsof -tiTCP:${PORT:-8081} -sTCP:LISTEN | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true); rm -f .server.pid; PORT=${PORT:-8081} node --import tsx src/server.ts > .server.log 2>&1 & echo $! > .server.pid; echo started_pid=$(cat .server.pid) port=${PORT:-8081}
scripts.dev:stop: if [ -f .server.pid ]; then kill $(cat .server.pid) 2>/dev/null || true; rm -f .server.pid; echo stopped; else echo no_pid_file; fi
scripts.dev:status: if [ -f .server.pid ] && ps -p $(cat .server.pid) >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo running pid=$(cat .server.pid); else echo not_running; fi
